title: what about the old runes and rune pages that we bought?
body:
hey, guys
I wonder what Riot will do about those runes and pages that we have bought, will they just refund those runes that were bought in 2017? how about those we bought before? I m so pissed now

replies.body: You'll be getting compensated for most of those runes and your rune pages will transfer over into the new rune system so no worries there! Be sure to check out the [**Preseason Update Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/preseason-update) for all the finer points on how you'll be getting compensated.
